mapper.select: select case when menuLarge.page_url is NULL then ( select page_url from tb_group_menu where menu_seq = ( select SUBSTRING_INDEX(menu_medium, ',', 1) as menuMedium from tb_group_user where group_seq=#{groupSeq} ) ) else menuLarge.page_url end page_url from ( select page_url from tb_group_menu where menu_seq = ( select SUBSTRING_INDEX(menu_large, ',', 1) as menuLarge from tb_group_user where group_seq=#{groupSeq} ) ) menuLarge ;
